MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 area of Hawick, affecting properties in Eastcote Farm and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am due to repairs required to our overhead electricity network near Briery Lodge and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:21am on Sunday, 27 December 2020
